about_the_game:
TanLing Notes - YuanLing Paper Hu Qi Autumn hunting Clothes (with 29999 Ling coins) DLC contains Grief Paper Hu Qiqiu Hung Clothes, with 29999 Ling coins attached to the skin.



"It should be noted that auspicious auspicious weather is accompanied by rain, and the hunting day is over at the beginning of the season."

Autumn hunting is one of the ancient ways for the imperial family to inspect and practice martial arts, hunt around and practice riding and shooting. Dressed in casual clothes, left Qiangcang, right Qianghuang, is the most wild romance.
